metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15135 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: It was found that 389-ds-base since 1.3.6.1 up to and including 1.4.0.3 did not always handle internal hash comparison operations correctly during the authentication process. A remote, unauthenticated attacker could potentially use this flaw to bypass the authentication process under very rare and specific circumstances.

notes.Note: leosilva> code in trusty and xenial are quite different from patch.

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.7.10-1ubuntu1').
